item0.name: Turbo Chemtank
item0.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item2.name: Randuin's Omen
item2.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item3.name: Bramble Vest
item3.description:
35 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item4.name: Spirit Visage
item4.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.name: Turbo Chemtank

25 Armor

20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item1.name: Plated Steelcaps
item1.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item2.name: Seeker's Armguard
item2.description:
20 Ability Power
15 Armor
  • Witch's Path: Killing a unit grants 0.5 Armor (max 15).

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

perk0.name: Predator
perk0.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.

40 Armor

item0.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item1.name: Divine Sunderer
item1.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Doran's Shield
item0.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.name: Randuin's Omen
item0.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Turbo Chemtank
item2.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item3.name: Spirit Visage
item3.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item4.name: Plated Steelcaps
item4.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item5.name: Bramble Vest
item5.description:
35 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item1.name: Turbo Chemtank
item1.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item2.name: Refillable Potion
item2.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item3.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
item3.description:
25 Move Speed
  • Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

item4.name: Doran's Ring
item4.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:

  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Refillable Potion
item2.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item3.name: Bami's Cinder
item3.description:
300 Health
  • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 25% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

item4.name: Cloth Armor
item4.description: 15 Armor

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Predator
perk0.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.

item0.name: Stopwatch
item0.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

item4.name: Force of Nature
item4.description:
350 Health
60 Magic Resist
5% Move Speed
  • Absorb: Taking damage from Abilities grants you 8 Move Speed and 4 Magic Resist for 5 seconds (stacks up to 5 times; each unique Ability instance can give one stack).

item5.name: Dead Man's Plate
item5.description:
400 Health
40 Armor
5% Move Speed
  • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Press the Attack
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
perk0.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

item0.name: Frostfire Gauntlet
item0.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste
  • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.
  • Snowbind: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds (4s cooldown). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% (increased by your max Health).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100 Health and 6% Size.

item2.description: 150 Health

item4.name: Doran's Shield
item4.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

35 Armor
